text: Rari mbari vhɨzgi, Zisas wom taagia Kaperneaman vergi. Ana vergap, wo phenan kim, gumgi gu mbigi vhɨrve ana taagia zergi kameŋ mbararagi. 2.1 Nza kaŋgi fhuvara. Mba phen ana the phen. Zisas Kaperneaman verav ana mba phenan ki. Mbe gumgi mbari, mbe khueŋ ndɨkndɨgi, ana Pita gum Andru phen ma (Mak 1.29 ganɨri).
